name: The Dungeon
description:
"The Dungeon" is a 2D pixel-art dungeon-crawling game. In the game, players step into the shoes of a brave warrior who ventures into every corner of the dungeon in pursuit of the ultimate treasure. They will battle dangerous monsters, engage in trades with benevolent merchants, and open randomly generated chests. Properly managing your finances by purchasing items or collecting them along the way can help upgrade your speed, health, and attack power, all of which are vital for overcoming monsters and surviving. The difficulty increases with each level, but the game becomes progressively more engaging, with the final boss eagerly awaiting your arrival. Additionally, the contents and placement of dungeon rooms are randomly generated, ensuring a unique and thrilling experience every time you enter the game!

The game can be controlled using keys like WASD and the mouse, and it also supports Xbox controller input.
